ygData.subject: Levelling past 40- kunark
ygData.msgSnippet:
Dreadlands is better at 40-45 for Kunark zones. Find yourself a snarer
partner and snare and scare, 2 people can do 40-45 pretty fast at the
skellie camp in
ygData.messageBody:
Dreadlands is better at 40-45 for Kunark zones. Find yourself a snarer
partner and snare and scare, 2 people can do 40-45 pretty fast at the
skellie camp in the NW corner. Or you should be able to find a group on the
wall of Karnor's anytime.

CoM : With one group pulling to zone, it's hard to insert past them to
another good location, but excellent exp.
Overthere: Sarnak knights top out at 39 or 40, not enough good exp there
past 40.
Kaesora : Great exp in a full group. Problem is finding a full group there.
Droga : Starts greening out at 42 or so.
Nurga : Believe it's lower level then Droga.

Lozi ~Hand of Chaos~ CT

> Message: 1
> Date: Wed, 15 Nov 2000 21:31:34 -0000
> From: "Steve Rutkowski" <srutkowski@...>
> Subject: Leveling past 40
>
> I'm looking for good places to level past level 40. This is my 3rd
> post 40 character, and I'd rather not level in SolB or Guk, and I've
> never PLed doing guards, however, this may be an option as I just
> want
> to level quickly. I'm also looking for places where I can solo
>
> Ideas I can come up with (although I don't know much about them
> eperience wise from a below 50 perspective):
>
> CoM- grouped
> Overthere- solo or small group (but really don't like this area)
> Kaesorea- grouped, MOBs from 25ish to level 40 (Xalgoz)
> Temple of Droga- grouped, not sure on the level range of things here
> Mines of Nurga- not sure at all on the level range here
> Frontier Mountains- group or solo
>
> Does anyone know the level range of MOBs in these zones? I killed a
> bunch of stuff in these zones when the expansion first came out, but
> with the exception of CoM at 51/52 I didn't get experience from any
> of
> them.
>
> Also, a little background, all the characters I've played from start
> to 50+ were all before Kunark, and while I've camped items in each of
> these zones with various people (so I do know the layouts), I've
> never
> done it for exp. I also don't know what agro on pulling is like.
>
> Any help on those who've leveled there would be great! Thanks!
